#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int path=0;


void calpath(int a[20][20],int n,int x,int y)
{


    if(x==n-1&&y==n-1)
    {


    path++;
    return;
    }

    a[x][y]=1;



    if(x-1>=0&&a[x-1][y]==0)
    calpath(a,n,x-1,y);


    if(y-1>=0&&a[x][y-1]==0)
    calpath(a,n,x,y-1);


    if(x+1<n&&a[x+1][y]==0)
    calpath(a,n,x+1,y);


    if(y+1<n&&a[x][y+1]==0)
    calpath(a,n,x,y+1);

    a[x][y]=0;



}


int main()
{
    int arr[20][20];
    int n,i,j;
    cin>>n;

    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            cin>>arr[i][j];


        calpath(arr,n,0,0);
        cout<<"\n"<<path;


    return 0;
}
